com.ex2

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ex2.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    class Task implements Runnable that execute Thread from the Thread pool and open url connection to get image (if exist) and insert it to th database
